posts.model: SETI 基础: 卡牌模型
posts.tech: SETI 进阶: 科技路线

about.title: 关于本网站
about.intro:
This is an open-source unofficial website of the board game Seti. It is not affiliated with Capstone Games in any way.
This project gets inspiration from ssimeonoff's website and for players to easily search for cards and their effects. The initial data for this site is sourced from <1>Cillie's List of animal cards</1>, while the icons and styles were borrowed from <3>BGA</3>. If there are any copyright concerns, I will address them.

features.title: Features
features.intro: Currently, this site has the following features:
features.li_1: All animal and sponsor cards in base game and Marine World expansion
features.li_3: Filters for tags, requirements, keywords and so on
features.li_5: Rating and comments for each card
features.plan_intro: In the future, I plan to add the following features:

thanks.title: Thanks
thanks.translation: Thanks for the following players for helping with translation: 小z, 晓慜, Yannick, Propaganda Panda.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q_1: How can I assist with the translation?
faq.a_1: Nice! You can follow the instructions <1>here</1>.
faq.q_2: Is this website created for commercial purposes?
faq.a_2: No, it's a open-source website dedicated to this fantastic game. Original images and texts belong to Capstone Games. f there are any copyright concerns, I will address them.
faq.q_3: What if I have another question, suggestion, or bug report related to this website?
faq.a_3: Feel free to comment in the <1>BGG thread</1> or submit an issue at <3>GitHub</3>.

dialog.warning-desc: 这部分可能会剧透并影响你的游戏体验。你确定要继续吗？
dialog.export-desc: 点击“确认”按钮后，将下载一个 .seti 文件。这个文件记录了这张卡牌的编辑状态，导出后可以通过“导入”按钮恢复当前编辑状态。如果你希望未来依然可以编辑这张卡牌，建议导出该文件。
